author: abcoathup
content: Is async participation in EPF study group possible?  Thinking about people in timezones such as Australia.

content: Yes sessions will be recorded! And there will be many other resources to study.

content: Webinars will be mostly in time slots like EPF, not good for Australia/East Asia, but there might be an exception with speakers from the area.
